2736.T.summary: Festaria Holdings Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells jewelry and jewelry accessories. The company also imports and sells jewelry. As of August 31, 2018, it operated 87 stores, which included 84 stores in Japan and 3 stores internationally. The company was formerly known as SADAMATSU Company Limited and changed its name to Festaria Holdings Co., Ltd. in March 2018. Festaria Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1920 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

7597.T.summary: Tokyo Kiho Co., Ltd. operates as a jewelry trading company in Japan. The company plans, manufactures, imports, and wholesales precious metal jewelry. It also offers diamond, colored stone, pearl, and brand jewelry under the Asplendi, Rusiora, and firefly brand names. The company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7762.T.summary: Citizen Watch Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells watches and their components worldwide. It operates through five segments: Watches, Machine Tools, Devices and Components, Electronic Products, and Other Products. The company offers watches, movements, and system clocks; CNC automatic lathes; machining cell; automotive components, compact switches, chip LEDs, LED lighting products, crystal devices, and ferroelectric LCDs; and digital photo printers, line thermal printers, calculators, electronic thermometers, and electronic blood pressure monitors. The company was formerly known as Citizen Holdings Co., Ltd., and changed its name to Citizen Watch Co., Ltd. in October 2016. Citizen Watch Co., Ltd. was founded in 1918 and is headquartered in Nishi-Tokyo, Japan.

7769.T.summary: Rhythm Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells clocks and watches in Japan and internationally. It also offers electronic parts and equipment, including on-vehicle and audiovisual equipment, as well as information processing equipment and related products; precision products, such as sensor-equipped camera components for automobiles; and connected terminals. The company was formerly known as Rhythm Watch Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Rhythm Co.,Ltd. in October 2020. Rhythm Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Saitama, Japan.

7771.T.summary: Nihon Seimitsu Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells wrist watch bands, eyeglass frames, and other products in Japan. The company offers carbide ceramic and pure titanium wrist watch, metal, and urethane bands, as well as bezels. It also provides fishing tackles, static electricity eliminators, and electronic locks, as well as ion plating services. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Kawaguchi, Japan.

7872.T.summary: Estelle Holdings Co.,Ltd. manufactures, imports, and sells jewelry and precious metals in Japan. It offers pearls and gemstones; and eyeglass frames. The company also wholesales gems and jewelry to mail order companies. It operates a network of 467 stores, including 368 jewelry stores, 61 eyeglass stores, 30 food stores and restaurants, and 8 fashion accessories stores. The company was formerly known as As-me ESTELLE CO., LTD. Estelle Holdings Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1946 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7878.T.summary: Kohsai Co.,Ltd. engages in the jewelry business in Japan. The company manufactures and sells precious metal accessories and jewelry parts. Its products include clasps, rings, pierce/catches, and earrings, as well as products for men. The company was formerly known as Kosaikogei Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Kohsai Co.,Ltd. in August 2017. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Kai, Japan. Kohsai Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Estio Co., Ltd.

7937.T.summary: Tsutsumi Jewelry Co.,Ltd. engages in manufacturing, wholesaling, and retailing jewelry primarily in Japan. It offers jewelry design, as well as reconditioning and repair of pre-owned jewelry. The company also operates precious stone trading centers in the United States, Belgium, Israel, India, and Thailand. It operates 173 specialty jewelry retail stores in Japan. The company was formerly known as Tsutsumi Precious Metals and Crafts Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tsutsumi Jewelry Co., Ltd. in April 1988. Tsutsumi Jewelry Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Warabi, Japan.

8139.T.summary: Nagahori Corporation manufactures, imports, exports, and sells gemstones, pearls, and precious metals in Japan and internationally. The company also offers fashion accessories and high-end label products. It serves department stores, specialty stores, and distributors. Nagahori Corporation was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

CHCLY.summary: Citizen Watch Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells watches and their components worldwide. It operates through five segments: Watches, Machine Tools, Devices and Components, Electronic Products, and Other Products. The company offers watches, movements, and system clocks; CNC automatic lathes; machining cell; automotive components, compact switches, chip LEDs, LED lighting products, crystal devices, and ferroelectric LCDs; and digital photo printers, line thermal printers, calculators, electronic thermometers, and electronic blood pressure monitors. The company was formerly known as Citizen Holdings Co., Ltd., and changed its name to Citizen Watch Co., Ltd. in October 2016. Citizen Watch Co., Ltd. was founded in 1918 and is headquartered in Nishi-Tokyo, Japan.

CTZ.F.summary: Citizen Watch Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells watches and their components worldwide. It operates through five segments: Watches, Machine Tools, Devices and Components, Electronic Products, and Other Products. The company offers watches, movements, and system clocks; CNC automatic lathes; machining cell; automotive components, compact switches, chip LEDs, LED lighting products, crystal devices, and ferroelectric LCDs; and digital photo printers, line thermal printers, calculators, electronic thermometers, and electronic blood pressure monitors. The company was formerly known as Citizen Holdings Co., Ltd., and changed its name to Citizen Watch Co., Ltd. in October 2016. Citizen Watch Co., Ltd. was founded in 1918 and is headquartered in Nishi-Tokyo, Japan.
